description: Venues serving food may sell alcohol but only to customers eating a meal at a table, the States says.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey closes pubs, bars and nightclubs
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey closes pubs, bars and nightclubs - BBC News
maintext: So far schools in Jersey have been closed until at least 20 April and all new arrivals to the island must self-isolate for 14 days.
